Category:Star Wars: The Old Republic voice actors

nodes.text: Olivia Hussey (born April 17, 1951) is an English actress who provided the voice of Kasan Moor in Star Wars: Rogue Squadron, AT-AA Driver and Abridon Refugee 2 in Star Wars: Force Commander, and Jedi Master Yuon Par in Star Wars: The Old Republic. She is best known for her first starring role, portraying Juliet in Franco Zeffirelli's 1968 film version of Shakespeare's Romeo and Juliet. She costarred with fellow Star Wars video game voice actor David Warner in 1993's Quest of the Delta Knights, and in the animated episodes "The Demon Reborn" of Superman: The Animated Series and "Out of the Past" of Batman Beyond, the latter of which also featured Mark Hamill as the voice of her character's adjutant.
